mapper.insert: insert into disposal_request (register_id, medical_technology_id, disposal_info, disposal_position, disposal_remark, creation_time, disposal_state) values (#{register_id}, #{medical_technology_id}, #{disposal_info}, #{disposal_position}, #{disposal_remark}, now(), '已开立');
mapper.update: update disposal_request set disposal_state = '已缴费' where id = #{id}
